original_text: Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his hand and put it on Joseph's hand, and clothed him in garments of fine linen and put a gold chain about his neck.
korean_text: 자기의 인장 반지를 빼어 요셉의 손에 끼우고 그에게 세마포 옷을 입히고 금 사슬을 목에 걸고

sentences.original_text: Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his hand
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 바로가 그의 손에서 인지 반지를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and put it on Joseph's hand
and clothed him in garments of fine linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 고급 린넨 옷으로 입혔습니다

sentences.original_text: and put a gold chain about his neck
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 목에 금 목걸이를 걸어주었습니다
